verses.sanskrit: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच | धर्मक्षेत्रे कुरुक्षेत्रे समवेता युयुत्सवः | मामकाः पाण्डवाश्चैव किमकुर्वत सञ्जय || 1 ||
verses.translation: Dhritarashtra said: O Sanjaya, assembled in the holy land of Kurukshetra and desiring to fight, what did my sons and the sons of Pandu do?
verses.transliteration: dhṛtarāṣhṭra uvācha dharmakṣhetre kurukṣhetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāśhchaiva kimakurvata sañjaya
verses.meaning: Dhritarashtra inquires about the events happening in the battlefield of Kurukshetra where his sons and the Pandavas are assembled to fight.

verses.sanskrit: सञ्जय उवाच | द्रोणमुपसंगम्य राजा वचनमब्रवीत् | पश्यैतां पाण्डुपुत्राणामाचार्य महतीं चमूम् || 2 ||
verses.translation: Sanjaya said: O King, after observing the Pandava army arranged in military formation by the son of Drupada, King Drona spoke the following words:
verses.transliteration: sañjaya uvācha dronamupasaṅgamya rājā vachanamabravīt pāśhyaitāṁ pāṇḍuputrāṇāmācārya mahatīṁ chamūm
verses.meaning: Sanjaya describes how King Drona saw the massive army of the Pandavas and spoke to the King.

verses.sanskrit: अस्मिन्स्थितो राजा धर्मक्षेत्रे कुरुक्षेत्रे | समवेता युयुत्सवः | मामकाः पाण्डवाश्चैव किमकुर्वत सञ्जय || 3 ||
verses.translation: O Sanjaya, in this holy land of Kurukshetra, what did my sons and the sons of Pandu do, being assembled and desiring to fight?
verses.transliteration: asminsthitō rājā dharmakṣhetre kurukṣhetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāśhchaiva kimakurvata sañjaya
verses.meaning: Dhritarashtra asks Sanjaya to describe what happened in Kurukshetra with both his sons and the Pandavas assembled for battle.

verses.sanskrit: धृतराष्ट्र उवाच | संजय उवाच | पश्यैतां पाण्डुपुत्राणामाचार्य महतीं चमूम् || 4 ||
verses.translation: Sanjaya said: O King, behold this mighty army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, your wise disciple.
verses.transliteration: sañjaya uvācha pāśhyaitāṁ pāṇḍuputrāṇāmācārya mahatīṁ chamūm
verses.meaning: Sanjaya describes how King Drona saw the powerful army of the Pandavas assembled and ready for battle.

verses.sanskrit: अयनेन वशी कर्णामुर्वेष्टितयुयुत्सवः | कालकोटि विधायमा वसुघ्नः पौरुषं व्यसात् || 5 ||
verses.translation: Behold the army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by your wise disciple. Behold this mighty army of the Pandavas.
verses.transliteration: ayanena vaśī karṇāmurveṣṭitayuyutsavaḥ kālakōṭi vidhāyamā vasughnaḥ pauruṣaṁ vyasāt
verses.meaning: Sanjaya explains the might of the Pandava army, arranged meticulously by the great warrior Drona.

verses.sanskrit: तत्रापश्यत्संनिहितं पुराणाश्वसतात्मनम् | परुषं सप्तवर्गाणां प्रलंबं सन्दर्शयन् || 6 ||
verses.translation: Behold, O King, the army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, is a vast and mighty force.
verses.transliteration: tatrāpaśhyatsannihitaṁ purāṇāśvasatātmanam paruṣaṁ saptavargāṇāṁ pralaṁbaṁ sandarśayan
verses.meaning: Sanjaya describes the vastness of the Pandava army, which is arranged and equipped for battle.

verses.sanskrit: सत्त्वम् आत्मानं सुहृत्प्रभावमुपागतम् | सञ्जयापि दृष्टमपि कुशाग्रास्तस्य शिष्यवत् || 7 ||
verses.translation: Behold, O King, the army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, is a mighty force.
verses.transliteration: sattvam ātmānaṁ suhrṛtpabhāvamupāgatam sañjayāpi dṛṣṭamapi kuśāgrāstasya śiṣyavat
verses.meaning: Sanjaya describes the formidable power of the Pandava army, emphasizing its great strength and strategic arrangement.

verses.sanskrit: एवं व्यासदर्शिता हरिश्वायाध्वजस्ततः | शिष्यं ब्रह्मसंयुक्तां विद्वानन्तरमागतम् || 8 ||
verses.translation: O King, behold this mighty army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, your wise disciple.
verses.transliteration: evaṁ vyāsadarśitā hariśvāyādvajastataḥ śiṣyaṁ brahmasaṅyuktāṁ vidvānantaramāgatam
verses.meaning: Sanjaya describes the magnificence of the Pandava army, arranged with expert strategic knowledge by Dronacharya.

verses.sanskrit: पौरुषं विद्वान् धर्मार्थद्वारं स्ववृत्तये | परुषं सहस्त्रभातं चतुःसप्ततिरुच्चरन || 9 ||
verses.translation: Behold, this mighty army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by your wise disciple. It is an enormous and formidable force.
verses.transliteration: pauruṣaṁ vidvān dharmārthadvāraṁ svavṛttaye paruṣaṁ sahastrabhātaṁ catuḥsaptatiruccaran
verses.meaning: Sanjaya highlights the power and size of the Pandava army, arranged skillfully by Dronacharya.

verses.sanskrit: यथा महात्मना वाचस्तरास्त्विह किञ्चन | पृथिव्यां गन्धमापन्ना विप्रच्छन्ति युयुत्सवः || 10 ||
verses.translation: Behold this mighty army of the sons of Pandu, arrayed by the son of Drupada, your wise disciple.
verses.transliteration: yathā mahātmanā vācastarāstva iha kiñcana pṛthivyāṁ gandhamāpannā vipracchanti yuyutsavaḥ
verses.meaning: Sanjaya speaks of the grandeur of the Pandava army, arranged strategically by the son of Drupada, Dronacharya.
